mxCell.value: Workday to Barclays Integration

Barclays File
Gateway SFTP
INT018

Barclays
Banking
Platform

Outbound:

INT018a: Barclays Payments Outbound

  • Triggered on UK Payroll/Expenses settlement completion (manual launch)
  • ISO 20022 v3 XML payment files (BACS format)
  • PGP encrypted using Barclays public key
  • SFTP with SSH key authentication
  • Document transformation for MyStandards compliance

Inbound

INT018b: Payment Acknowledgement Inbound (scheduled day after payment)

INT018c: Bank Statement Inbound (daily schedule)
  • ISO 20022 v3 XML acknowledgements + CAMT.053 statements
  • PGP encrypted using Workday public key
  • SFTP with SSH key authentication
  • Files decrypted using Workday private key

Barclays processes payment files and generates acknowledgements
Prior-day statements (CAMT.053) provided daily for reconciliation
INT018a OUTBOUND - PAYMENT FILE GENERATION
PAYMENT FILE GENERATION

• Triggered: Manual launch on UK Payroll or Expenses settlement completion
  • Template: WPN ISO 20022 V3 (Enhanced Performance)
  • Data Source: Workday Payroll/Expenses settlement for The FA Limited
  • Expected Volumes: 12th payroll ~100, 25th payroll ~1,500 (2 files), Expenses ~400
  • File Format: ISO 20022 v3 XML (BACS payment type)
  • Document Transformation: Applied to ensure MyStandards portal compliance
ENCRYPTION & TRANSMISSION

• PGP Encryption: Payment files encrypted using Barclays-provided public key
  • SFTP Authentication: SSH key-based (environment-specific keys)
  • Transmission: Encrypted file uploaded to Barclays File Gateway
  • Legal Entity: The Football Association Limited only
  • Bank Account: Barclays account ending *****220
  • Integration Event: Logged in Process Monitor with file attachment
INT018b INBOUND - ACKNOWLEDGEMENT RETRIEVAL
PAYMENT ACKNOWLEDGEMENT

• Scheduled: Day after payment submission
  • Template: Import Payment Status Report
  • SFTP Connection: SSH key authentication to Barclays File Gateway
  • File Retrieval: ISO 20022 v3 XML payment status files
  • Decryption: Files decrypted using Workday PGP private key
  • Status Updates: Payment records in Workday updated (Processed/Failed status)
STATUS IMPORT

• Import: Payment status data imported into Workday Banking
  • Reconciliation: Enables validation of submitted vs processed payments
  • Reporting: Payment status visible in Workday banking reports
  • Error Handling: Failed payments flagged for investigation
  • Notifications: Alerts sent for integration errors/warnings
INT018c INBOUND - STATEMENT RETRIEVAL
BANK STATEMENT INBOUND

• Scheduled: Daily
  • Template: Import ISO 20022 Bank Statements
  • SFTP Connection: SSH key authentication to Barclays File Gateway
  • File Retrieval: Prior-day bank statements in CAMT.053 XML format
  • Decryption: Files decrypted using Workday PGP private key
  • Account: Barclays *****220 (The FA Limited)
STATEMENT IMPORT

• Import: Bank statement data imported into Workday Banking
  • Account Updates: Balance and transaction data for account *****220
  • Reconciliation: Enables automated bank reconciliation processes
  • Reporting: Prior-day statements visible in Workday reports
  • Notifications: Alerts sent for integration 253D%2522260%2522%2520y%253D%252280%2522%2520as%253D%2522geometry%2522%252F%253E%253C%252FmxCell%253E%253C%252Froot%253E%253C%252FmxGraphModel%253E%26lt%3B%2Fspan%26gt%3BData%20Retention%3A%20Integration%20outputs%20stored%20in%20Workday%20for%20180%20days%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bli%26gt%3BFrequency%3A%20Daily%26lt%3B%2Fli%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Ful%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Fdiv%26gt%3B%22%20placeholders%3D%221%22%20name%3D%22Variable%22%20id%3D%222%22%3E%3CmxCell%20parent%3D%221%22%20style%3D%22text%3Bhtml%3D1%3BstrokeColor%3Dnone%3BfillColor%3Dnone%3Balign%3Dleft%3BverticalAlign%3Dtop%3BwhiteSpace%3Dwrap%3Boverflow%3Dhidden%3BfontSize%3D14%3B%22%20vertex%3D%221%22%3E%3CmxGeometry%20height%3D%22280%22%20width%3D%22532.5%22%20x%3D%2210%22%20y%3D%22590%22%20as%3D%22geometry%22%2F%3E%3C%2FmxCell%3E%3C%2FUserObject%3E%3C%2Froot%3E%3C%2FmxGraphModel%3E

UserObject.label:
SECURITY & TECHNICAL DETAILS
  • Integration Type: Workday Cloud Connect (3 integrations)
  • File Formats: ISO 20022 v3 XML (payments & acknowledgements), CAMT.053 XML (statements)
  • Expected Volumes: ~2,000-2,500 monthly payments across all runs
  • Encryption: PGP encryption using Barclays public key (outbound) & Workday public key (inbound)
  • Authentication: SSH key-based SFTP (environment-specific keys required)
  • Data in Transit: SSH encryption layer on SFTP connections
  • Document Retention: Integration output files stored 180 days in Workday
  • File Validation: Barclays MyStandards portal for ISO 20022 v3 BACS format compliance
  • Environment Isolation: Separate SSH/PGP keys for Sandbox, Implementation, Production
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
SYSTEM OF RECORD
  • Workday HCM: Employee records, organizational data, bank account details
  • Workday Payroll: UK payroll settlement data (gross pay, deductions, net pay, payment dates)
  • Workday Expenses: Expense claim settlement data (amounts, claimants, payment dates)
  • Workday Banking: Target for payment status acknowledgements and bank statement imports
  • Scope: The Football Association Limited only; BACS payments only
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
KEY ATTRIBUTES SYNCHRONIZED

OUTBOUND (Payments):
  • Employee/Claimant: Legal names, bank account number, sort code
  • Payment Details: Net pay/reimbursement amount, payment date, reference
  • Organizational: Legal entity (The FA Limited), cost center, payment type
INBOUND (Acknowledgements):
  • Payment Status: Processed, Failed, Pending
  • Bank Reference: Barclays transaction references
  • Status Dates: Processing date, confirmation timestamp
INBOUND (Statements):
  • Account Balance: Opening balance, closing balance, available funds
  • Transactions: Debits, credits, transaction dates, references
  • Account: Barclays *****220 (The FA Limited)
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
ENVIRONMENT STRATEGY
  • Sandbox: Integration development, initial testing, key validation
  • Implementation (Preview): UAT, end-to-end testing with Barclays test environment
  • Production (Gold): Live payment processing from April 1, 2026
  • Environment-Specific Configuration:
    • Unique SSH keys per environment (regenerated on tenant migration)
    • Unique PGP key pairs per environment
    • Separate SFTP endpoints registered with Barclays Integration Manager
  • Key Exchange: Keys provided to Barclays contacts (matthew.gregory@barclays.com,
    simon.tyrrell@barclays.com, michael.umoh@barclays.com)
UserObject.name: Variable

UserObject.label:
CRITICAL CONSTRAINTS
  • Manual Launch Required: INT018a cannot be scheduled automatically - must be
    manually launched on settlement completion (Workday parameter limitation)
  • Banking Standards: Payment files must pass Barclays MyStandards portal validation
  • Environment-Specific Keys: SSH and PGP keys must be regenerated and registered
    with Barclays for each environment migration
  • Hypercare Limitation: All issues must be identified within hypercare period per SOW
  • Payment Types: BACS only - no Faster Payments or CHAPS
  • Legal Entity: The Football Association Limited only (Account *****220)
UserObject.name: Variable
